Honor 90 5G Smartphone (12/512GB)

The Honor 90 5G Smartphone features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with 1B colors and a refresh rate of 120Hz, which provides a rich and seamless visual experience. Images and movies are presented with remarkable clarity at a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels. This smartphone provides quick and efficient performance thanks to the Snapdragon 7 Gen 1 Accelerated Edition processor. It has 512GB of storage 8GB, and 12GB of RAM, providing plenty of storage and seamless multitasking. The primary camera combination includes a 200 MP wide lens, a 12 MP ultrawide lens, and a 2 MP depth sensor for detailed and immersive photographs. A 50 MP ultrawide lens on the selfie camera ensures high-quality self-portraits. The Honor 90 5G Smartphone delivers long-lasting power and speedy charging with a 5000 mAh battery with 66W wired charging.

200MP Ultra-Clear Rear Camera: Master of Photography

The Honor 90 features a 200MP Ultra-Clear Main Camera with the biggest 1/1.4-inch sensor in its class. A 12MP Ultra Wide and Macro 2-in-1 Camera, a 2MP Depth Camera, and a 50MP Selfie Camera with a 100Â° wide field of view (FOV) round out this remarkable camera system. The Honor 90 is a photography enthusiast's dream with its powerhouse of cameras, capable of taking gorgeous photographs and movies in incredible detail and clarity.

120Hz Quad-Curved Floating AMOLED Display

The phone has a 6.7-inch quad-curved bezel-less AMOLED display with a resolution of 2664x1200. With a refresh rate of 120Hz, it offers smooth and quick touch interactions. The display also supports up to 1.07 billion colors and a segment-leading peak HDR brightness of 1600 nits while covering 100% of the DCI-P3 color gamut. The display's capacity to repair picture distortions is genuinely astonishing, offering an unsurpassed visual experience.

3840Hz PWM Dimming in the Industry

The Honor 90 is committed to promoting eye health with its groundbreaking technology. It features an industry-first 3840Hz Pulse Width Modulation (PWM) Dimming, offering a flicker-free viewing experience and reducing eye strain, especially in dimly lit environments. Your visual comfort is a top priority.

Extraordinary Performance

The Honor 90 is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 1 Accelerated Edition 5G CPU manufactured on a 4nm technology. This processor provides great performance and performs even the most intensive and demanding jobs with ease. It includes a super-large artery biomimetic VC, a Gen 3 high thermal conductivity graphite sheet, and a full-scene AI intelligent thermal management system to keep the device cool and working effectively. This precise temperature regulation and heat dissipation technology ensure maximum performance.

Honor MagicOS 7.1

The Honor 90 is powered by Android 13 and runs Honor's MagicOS 7.1. This all-purpose intelligent collaborative operating system blends the best of both worlds by smoothly integrating several Google services like as Google Voice Assistant, Google Chrome, and Google Maps. It also supports Microsoft's "Link to Windows" function, which allows Honor 90 customers to easily connect their smartphone to a PC for increased productivity and convenience.

full_description:
Honor Magic 6 Pro 5G Smartphone (12/512GB)

The Honor Magic 6 Pro is a cutting-edge smartphone with a 6.8-inch LTPO OLED display that supports 1 billion colors, a refresh rate of 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR, and a maximum brightness of 5000 nits. With NanoCrystal Shield applied, the screen resolution is 1280 x 2800 pixels with an aspect ratio of 19.5:9 and a pixel density of roughly 453 ppi. The gadget is powered by the Qualcomm SM8650-AB Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, which is paired with an octa-core CPU and an Adreno 750 GPU to provide top-notch performance. It runs Android 14 with MagicOS 8. A 180 MP periscope telephoto lens with 2.5x optical zoom, a 50 MP ultrawide lens with LED flash, HDR, and panorama, and a 50 MP wide lens with Laser AF, PDAF, and OIS comprise the primary camera system. The Honor Magic 6 Pro has excellent video capabilities; it can record in 10-bit and 4K at different frame speeds. In addition to a 50 MP front camera with 4K video recording capabilities, the camera also features a TOF 3D sensor for depth and biometrics. A suite of sensors, including an accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, and color spectrum, as well as Face ID and an under-display fingerprint sensor are security features. Additionally, the device can send and receive emergency SOS calls and messages via satellite. Long-lasting power and versatility are ensured by its 5600 mAh battery, which supports 80W wired and 66W wireless charging in addition to reverse wireless and 5W reverse wired charging capabilities.

World as New, Vision as New

With features like 4320Hz PWM Flicker Free Dimming, 2 Dynamic Dimming, Circadian Night, and Natural Tone Display, the Honor Magic 6 Pro screen will relax your eyes before bed with softer light and relieve eye strain for the best possible eye protection.

HONOR NanoCrystal Shield

HONOR NanoCrystal Shield Industry First SGS Multiple Scenarios Drop Resistance Certification is included with the Honor Magic 6 Pro. The recently improved HONOR NanoCrystal Shield is exquisite and long-lasting, ten times more drop-resistant, and certified by SGS as having a 5-star glass drop resistance capacity in a variety of scenarios.

Next-Generation HONOR Falcon Camera System

With its 180MP Just for Extraordinary camera, the Honor Magic 6 Pro can capture incredibly detailed images, even when magnified. A far landscape is only a touch away thanks to the 2.5x optical zoom and 10X digital zoom. The aperture of the f/1.4-f/2.0 self-adjusting HONOR Falcon primary camera is very dynamic. You can immediately grasp the atmosphere surrounding you thanks to the clearly defined depth of field and blurring effects. By using 8 million movement samples from 10 different sports categories, HONOR AI Motion Sensing Capture can automatically record more thrilling sporting events.

Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Chipset

With its powerful cores, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip in the Honor Magic 6 Pro offers flagship performance. With the combination of algorithm and antenna, the HONOR C1+ RF Enhanced Chip improves connectivity and enables global travel with robust hardware and software capabilities. Perfect for traveling abroad, always online. The dual-TEE feature of the HONOR Discrete Security Chip S1 guarantees comprehensive privacy protection.

HONOR Gen 2nd Silicon-Carbon Battery

With its integrated HONOR E1 Power Enhanced Chip and HONOR Power Management System, the Honor Magic 6 Pro's 5600mAh ultra-large capacity battery greatly enhances the battery experience in cold climates. Simply relish the cold season. With constant power, the SuperCharge Charger is compatible with both 66W14 HONOR Wireless and 80W14 HONOR Wired SuperCharges.

IP68 Dust & Water Resistance

The Honor Magic 6 Pro, equipped with IP68 Dust and Water Resistance, opens the door to worry-free travel that is unaffected by weather conditions, an eco-friendly silicone polymer back, and a glass front and back.

full_description:
Honor Magic V2 5G Foldable Smartphone (16/512GB)

The Honor Magic V2 Foldable Smartphone features a Foldable LTPO OLED display with 1 billion colors, HDR10+, and a peak brightness of 1600 nits. With a screen-to-body ratio of roughly 88.5%, it unfolds to a 7.92-inch display. Its cover display is a 6.43-inch LTPO OLED panel that improves convenience with a refresh rate of 120Hz and a brightness of 2500 nits. Running on Android 13 with MagicOS 7.2 under the hood, it is equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset for seamless performance and multitasking. Its powerful Cortex-X3 core and octa-core CPU architecture promise remarkable speed and efficiency. Smooth graphics rendering is ensured by the Adreno 740 GPU, making it perfect for multimedia and gaming. With a flexible triple-camera configuration that includes a 50 MP wide lens with PDAF and OIS, a 20 MP telephoto lens with 2.5x optical zoom and OIS, and a 50 MP ultrawide lens for wide-angle photos, the Honor Magic V2 Foldable Smartphone excels in photography. Impressive video capabilities include gyro-EIS and 4K recording at 30/60 frames per second with 10-bit depth. Selfies are even more remarkable since the 16 MP front camera captures fine details. With a large 5000 mAh Si-Ca battery that supports both 66W wired charging and 5W reverse wired charging, the Honor Magic V2 folding phone offers extended usage without sacrificing performance. The Honor Magic V2 creates a new benchmark for foldable smartphones by fusing cutting-edge technology and elegant design, offering a genuinely immersive and seamless user experience.

9.9mm Folded Thickness, 4.7mm Unfolded Thickness

It weighs 231g and has a thickness of 9.9 mm when folded and 4.7 mm when unfolded. Better than holding your bar phone, it's lighter and slimmer. The newest foldable from Honor is the thinnest on the market, measuring 156.7 x 145.4 x 4.7 mm when unfolded. The Honor Magic V2 is the thinnest foldable phone even when folded, measuring 156.7 x 74.1 x 9.9 mm when folded. Expert full-process HDR display that amplifies and draws attention to the highlights. The large screen and portability come together in this solution.

Titanium Hinge, Super-light And Reliable

The new HONOR Super-light Titanium Hinge, compatible with the Honor Magic V2 Folding Smartphone, has received SGS certification for dependability. Extra opportunities to be ultra-light are brought about by this sturdy construction and design. A multi-angle hovering and smooth unfolding to a pure flat screen are guaranteed by the HONOR gearless design with the Super-light Titanium Hinge. Concealed when folded and wrinkle-free when unfolded, the suspended water-drop support is robust and adaptable.

3840Hz Risk-free Dimming Screen

The 3840H-z PWM Dimming and Dynamic Dimming Screen, equipped with Honor Magic V2, can intelligently adjust to the brightness of the display, thereby alleviating eye fatigue. Before going to bed, the Circadian Night Display softens the screen's light to make it more aesthetically pleasing and natural for the eyes.

Flagship Standard, Dual Screen

With screen-to-body ratios for both screens of the Honor Magic V2 Foldable Smartphone exceeding 90%, you can enjoy a more engaging visual experience. The Honor Magic V2 has an inner display that is 7.92-inch full-HD+ (2344 Ã 2156 pixels) LTPO OLED with a refresh rate of 120Hz, a screen-to-body ratio of 90.4 percent, 1600 nits of peak brightness, and 402ppi of pixel density. The Magic V2's external display is a 6.43-inch full-HD+ (2376 Ã 1060 pixels) LTPO panel with a refresh rate of 120Hz, a screen-to-body ratio of 91.2 percent, and a maximum brightness of 2500 nits. There is stylus support on both screens.

All-New Flagship Chip, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2

The flagship Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 mobile platform of the Honor Magic V2 Foldable Smartphone works in tandem with HONOR's three Boost engines to provide a more seamless experience. With a 29000mm total heat dissipation area and a 0.22mm VC thickness, the HONOR Ultra-thin Bionic Cooling System is equipped to handle any situation. You can always approach the world without boundaries thanks to the HONOR C1 RF Enhanced Chipset and the surrounding antenna.

Triple Main Camera System

A 50-megapixel primary sensor, a second 50-megapixel ultra-wide unit with optical image stabilization (OIS), and a 20-megapixel sensor with a telephoto lens that also supports OIS make up the Honor Magic V2 Folding Phone's triple rear camera unit. There is a 16-megapixel sensor on the front camera. Every detail in a shot will be visible thanks to the 40x telephoto camera. You can take a masterpiece without anyone else's assistance and free up your hands with the free-hovering foldable screen. Take a picture automatically without pressing the shutter. 8x8 dToF Laser Focusing System: faster and more accurate focusing thanks to real-time depth information detection. The Flicker Sensor and Color Temperature Sensor work together to efficiently reduce flicker in photos, capture complex light, and bring back the natural beauty of color.

5000mAh HONOR Silicon-Carbon Dual Battery

The ultra-slim, long-lasting 5000mAh HONOR Silicon-Carbon Dual Battery may be used for an entire day. With a 5,000mAh battery and support for 66W Honor SuperCharge charging technology, the Honor Magic V2 is comparable to its predecessor. In addition, the phone has USB 3.1 Type-C, GPS, NFC, Bluetooth 5.3 LE, Wi-Fi 802.11ax, 5G, and 4G connection. It has a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for security.
